TEI.2.document_title: Louisiana Advertiser to Stephen F. Austion, 03-18-1826

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1290

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Receipt for subscription.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="03-18-1826">March 18 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* To the *location_mentioned*Louisiana Advertiser*/location_mentioned*, Dr.*/p*
*p*For 1 years subscription, from *date_mentioned n="08-01-1825">1st August 1825*/date_mentioned* to *date_mentioned n="08-01-1826">1st August 1826*/date_mentioned*— to weekly Paper____________________________________________$5. 00*/p*
*p*Recd payment of *person_mentioned*Mr. Richardson*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Beardslee*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Penrice*/person_mentioned*.*/p* */div1*
